cards.title: Perspective
cards.description: An HTC Vive game based on anamorphic art
cards.longDescription: Perspective is a VR game created for the HTC Vive that focuses on the theme of anamorphic illusions. This was built with an interdisciplinary team of 5 over the course of two weeks. My main roles in this project were designing the puzzles and creating the 3D/2D art assets, along with supporting the programmers.
cards.linkPretext: You can find a recording of the gameplay
